# Document Title

> **For Humans**: State how readers should use this document and what outcomes it supports.
>
> **For AI Agents**: Call out binding instructions, validation steps, or escalation triggers.

## Overview

Provide high-level context and scope. Keep to 2â€“3 short paragraphs.

## Core Content

Break down the subject with predictable H2/H3 headings. Use ordered lists for procedures and bullets for independent tasks.
